text: Department of Land Records & Consolidation, Haryana is a Ministry and department of the Government of Haryana in India. ==Description== This department came into existence when Haryana was established as a new state within India after being separated from Punjab. Abhimanyu Sindhu is the cabinet minister responsible for this department from October 2014.New CM Khattar Keeps Home, Abhimanyu Finance & Revenue ==See also== * Government of Haryana ==References== Land records and Consolidation Category:Land management in India
title: Department of Land records & Consolidation, Haryana
